system.description:
A plain-looking robe with the power to conjure objects out of thin air.

  • Arcane spell casters: After donning the robe, they notice a series of cloth patches sewn into it, shaped like items.

  • Other characters: Cannot perceive or use the powers of this robe.

  • Removing a patch: Takes 1 round. The patch permanently turns into the corresponding item.

  • Types of patches: The robe has the following patches when found:

    1. Two daggers.
    2. Two 10’ poles.
    3. Two lanterns, lit and filled with oil.
    4. Two large sacks.
    5. Two steel, hand-sized mirrors.
    6. Two 50’ ropes.
    7. [[/r 4d4]] items rolled on the table below.
